tags.name: HUD
tags.description: Having to do with heads up display

settings.name: Dialog Max Height
settings.description: The maximum size of the dialog topic list box. Default 230 will fit 5 one-line topics with the default font.

settings.name: Numbered Topics
settings.description: If you are using a mod that assigns numeric shortcuts to dialog topics, you can set this to 1 to display numbers on their left.

settings.name: Container Height
settings.description: The height of the container, barter and recipe lists. Maximum is 560. The default 420 takes into account companion subtitles on New Vegas and, more importantly, the fact that it's a game menu, not some bean-counting spreadsheet.

settings.name: Status Info
settings.description: To allow easy inspection of CND, RAD and hardcore stats, VUI+ sets the brightness of their buttons at the Stats menu according to their magnitude. If you'd like see their numeric values next to those buttons, set it to 2. To revert the buttons to the vanilla style, set it to 0.

settings.name: HUD Prompt
settings.description: By default VUI+ reduces the visual impact of the HUD activation prompt by fading its brightness and hiding its button label. This enhances the player's focus on the activator name which is a much more important element. For an even more minimal prompt you can set this to 2 which hides the action prompt for named activators. Setting this to 0 will revert the prompt to its vanilla style.
